sentences.en: Like compression molding, this method is used to form thermoset materials and involves permanently curing the plastic in a mold under heat and pressure.
sentences.cn: 像压缩成型，使用这种方法，形成热固性材料和涉及永久固化塑料模具在高温下和压力。

sentences.en: Made from thermoset acrylic acid resin and high - grade melamine resinwith weather resistant color, organic solvents and addictives.
sentences.cn: 由热固性丙烯酸树脂及高级三聚氰胺树脂,配以耐候性颜料 、 有机溶剂和助剂精制而成.

sentences.en: Of this quantity 15 % was added to thermoset ant 85 % to thermoplastic polymers.
sentences.cn: 其中15%加于热固性聚合物,85%加于热塑性聚合物.

sentences.en: Pearlescent Pigment luster almost apply to all thermoset and thermoplastics.
sentences.cn: 添彩珠光颜料几乎适用于所有热固性和热塑性塑料.

sentences.en: Performance of thermoset rubber but processed like thermoplastic.
sentences.cn: 热固性橡胶之性能,热塑性塑料之加工方法.

sentences.en: Perstorp has been actively involved in engineering thermoset compounds for more than 80 years.
sentences.cn: 嗄昀矗璃erstorp一直积极致力于热固性化合物的开发.

sentences.en: Precision is a professional manufacturer of plastic model ( including thermoplastic and thermoset ) and precision die - casting mould.
sentences.cn: 是专业制造精密塑胶模 ( 包括热塑性和热固性 ) 和精密压铸模.

sentences.en: The specific requirements for the solvents used in thermoset paint system have been reviewed.
sentences.cn: 综述了热固型涂料中溶剂的特性要求,提出了溶剂的选择原则,并介绍了几种常用溶剂.
